data.eml:eml: Five new species of the genus Meganola Dyar, 1898 (Lepidoptera: Nolidae: Nolinae) from China

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Hu, Yan-Qing, Han, Hui-Lin, László, Gyula M., Ronkay, Gábor, Wang, Min (2013): Five new species of the genus Meganola Dyar, 1898 (Lepidoptera: Nolidae: Nolinae) from China. Zootaxa 3608 (7): 595-600, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3608.7.6
